title: Rising production costs create recessionary gap

content.question: An economy is currently operating at the full-employment level of output. Which of the following would result in a recessionary gap in the short run?

choices.label: An increase in the costs of production
An improvement in the productivity of labor
A decrease in income tax rates

content.answer: An increase in the costs of production

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run
